text: Such a convenient store. Bought a sack of potatoes & onions. Also, bought thani saaru leaves. I like the set up to show an array of veggies. Reasonable prices.
You'll find all your Indian essentials at this store, and it's conveniently located; we stayed right behind it, ensuring easy access. They even stock fresh fruits and vegetables

Very unhygienic. The shop is filled by pigeons by day that are allowed to stay all over the provisions . When the shop closes by night, the vegetable section outside the store is a haven for rats and other vermin. They have recently worsened the billing experience by segregating their products which is highly disorganized and inconvenient. The staff have poor service etiquette resulting in a poor customer experience.
Price so far ok. Arrangement of item or groceries its easy to find place. But coriander (கொத்தமல்லி) will not give free 😂😂. The rest everything good. 😊 👍
I like the place. All kind of indian fresh vegetables are there.. in this covid time its good we can get all vegetables easily over there.
